Transforming Education: Virtual Tours at Limavady High School

How 360° virtual tours transformed student engagement and accessibility at Limavady High School

Project Overview

Limavady High School partnered with 360spaces to create an immersive virtual tour experience that showcases their state-of-the-art facilities, vibrant learning environments, and unique educational atmosphere. This comprehensive digital solution allows prospective students and families to explore the school from anywhere, at any time.

The virtual tour captures every aspect of school life - from modern classrooms and science laboratories to sports facilities and common areas - providing an authentic feel for what makes Limavady High School a premier educational destination.

The Challenge

Like many educational institutions, Limavady High School faced the challenge of effectively showcasing their facilities to prospective students and families who couldn't always visit in person. Traditional photography and brochures couldn't capture the full scale and atmosphere of their impressive campus.

The school needed a solution that would increase accessibility, reduce the burden on staff for individual tours, and provide a compelling digital experience that truly represented their educational excellence.

Our Solution

We developed a comprehensive virtual tour that brings Limavady High School's campus to life through cutting-edge 360° technology. The solution includes:

  • Interactive navigation through all key areas of the school
  • Integrated multimedia content including videos and information points
  • Mobile-responsive design for access on any device
  • Accessibility features ensuring inclusive access for all users
  • Seamless integration with the school's existing website
The virtual tour has transformed how we engage with prospective families. It's increased our reach significantly and allows parents and students to get a genuine feel for our school environment before they visit.
Sarah Mitchell Head of Admissions, Limavady High School
